  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      Initializes Controller. Loads the selected part and populates the fields with info from the part selected.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      rb -

    • inHouseRadioClicked

      protected void inHouseRadioClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      In house radio clicked. changes the boolean for determining in in-house our out-sourced, the toggled label text to "Machine ID", unselects out-sourced radio, clears the machine invalid input: '&' company input, and resets the UI error messages.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - in-house radio clicked

    • outsourcedRadioClicked

      protected void outsourcedRadioClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Out Sourced radio clicked. changes the boolean for determining in in-house our out-sourced, the toggled label text to "Company", unselects in-house radio, clears the machine invalid input: '&' company input, and resets the UI error messages.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - out-sourced radio clicked

    • saveButtonClicked

      protected void saveButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Save button clicked. Checks for any blanks in the input, checks if min is less than max, and checks if Inv is equal or less than max or equal to or greater than min. If any of those conditions are not met then the UI will display an error message related to the condition not met and will not save new part till conditions are met. Otherwise, the part will be updated in the inventory and the program will return to the main window.
      Parameters:
      event - save button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • cancelButtonClicked

      protected void cancelButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Cancel button clicked. Returns program back to the main window.
      Parameters:
      event - cancel button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception
